data.title: Michael Connelly Books and Movies List
data.meta_description: Michael Connelly bibliography - list of all Michael Connelly books and movies
data.text:
Michael Connelly Books and Movies

Michael Connelly (born July 21, 1956) is an American bestselling author of detective stories and crime fiction. It took him nine years to write his first published novel, "The Black Echo".

Despite many of Connelly works were bestsellers, just two of them -- "Blood Work" and "The Lincoln Lawyer" -- have been adapted into feature films.

As do many other crime fiction novelists, Michael Connelly creates series of stories featuring the same main characters. Therefore PickGoodBook provides the tool allowing to transform our full list of Michael Connelly books in chronological order into the series listing. Reading series in the correct chronology is the preferred way to prevent spoilage.

Other interesting stuff

Ten episodes of the first season of "Bosch" based on Michael Connelly crime stories where released through 2014-2015. On March 18, 2015, Harry Bosch thrillers were renewed for a second TV series season. The new season is coming out soon.

Some stats: Eight of Michael Connelly books (16% out of total 49) have been adapted to 2 movies, 60 episodes from 1 TV series
